## AWSBuckets.deletePolicy() method

Delete resource permission policy associated with a bucket

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
deletePolicy(bucketName: string): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  bucketName | string | Bucket name |
